* Make Image - Ramdisk 

  make Image
  dd if=uRamdisk of=Ramdisk bs=64 skip=1

* Copy Image, Ramdisk-APM to /boot folder. Then modified at grub.cfg

* How to check config 

[root@(none) ~]# cat /proc/config.gz | gunzip  | grep CONFIG_IPV6=y                                              
CONFIG_IPV6=y                                                                                                
[root@(none) ~]# cat /proc/config.gz | gunzip  | grep STP
CONFIG_STP=y                                                                                                 
[root@(none) ~]#
